name: MMixRealisticA1
description:
It is another previous model what I did last month.

Those models are very similar.

  • You can also use controlnet,

  • It's good to do the poses.

I can't use controlnet if it can fail.

  • how difficult the crooked hands....! There's no other way.

It's a bit complicated. That's how the models are, the ads are more difficult to find, the ads are different and they keep changing. And well, I look for a realistic photograph, they are like photos. there is no other way of real. but the shapes of the models are beautiful: anime, realistic, cartoon, drawings, magazines, robot, warrior, hero, characters, luxury houses, fantasies, whatever they can do, LORA, textual...

And why don't you show me your work?

I hope you like them!

  • if you can, or save your hard disks or disks or pen drive... with safetensors, because they are large MB, or if some can delete the files, your documents

Hires. fix

resize: from 440x480 to 901x983

scaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+

hire steps: 44

noise suppression force: 0.7

Exclusive by: 2.05

Resize width to: 0

Steps: 44, Sampler: DDIM, CFG Scale: 7, Size: 440x480, Denoise Force: 0.7, Upscale Hire: 2.05, Step Hire: 44, Upscale Hire: R-ESRGAN 4x+

Thank you.
